website_summaries.verdict: A cleverly-designed, well-constructed, and powerful automatic pot stirrer that will save you time and energy in the kitchen.
pros: It is cleverly designed to automatically adjust to just about any size pot
The device is sturdy and well-made, with good, consistent stirring action when fully charged (the rechargeable battery charge lasts about 4 hours) and a quiet motor
cons: The stirring speed is not adjustable and it doesn't work well with very thick mixtures

customer_reviews.title: Your new best friend when it comes to stirring...

With out the stirmate the pot would shut of in protection mode to to scorching, with the stirmate scorching never happened and my food consistently cooked to temperature. Using it for travel it is hard to stow the stirring wand but I was able to find a bag that just fit. So far so good!! Hoping the snug fit won’t break anything.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Company
customer_reviews.text: Stirmate is a kitchen time saver. It literally prevents having to stand over a hot stove to make favorites like tapioca pudding and polenta. I had purchased the OmniXL Stainless Steel stirrer to replace the plastic that they had honestly admitted was not BPA-free. The stainless steel stirrer had a small piece that didn't fit properly. Dimitri immediately called me in response to my email and replaced the piece that day. The unit itself is easy to use, the charge holds a long time and it's fun! I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and quiet.  I'm using stainless steel attachment

This is due to the stirring arms being so thin they do not break up the formations. Still much less skin than not stirring, and only at higher temps. Saves me hours standing over a pot of heating (and then cooling) milk - I'm very happy. Clamp is secure on side of pot. Operation is very simple. Charging is very simple and I love that it is rechargeable.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as we wanted

We've had the stirrer running for two weeks now, and we love what it does. The sauce actually tastes better than when we stir the pot ourselves. customer_reviews.title: Awesome Automatic Stirring Unit.
customer_reviews.text: The Stirmate auto stirring unit has changed my life forever. I craft homemade candy in my home and sell it locally to family and friends. This automatic stirring unit allows me to more productive and successful growing my candy my business. It is so easy to use and will adjust to any size pan. It is well made and durable. The torque of the motor powers through the various mixtures with ease. It's rechargeable and has great battery life. This unit is a must have for any chef, cook or homemaker. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, not so good with thicker sauces and stuff
customer_reviews.text: Product works as it says but I have found it does not still real well when your sauce it thick. Need a different paddle to attach to it. I see they have a metal wire type one. Will have to try that. The plastic stirrer it comes with is OK. The battery lasts for hours and has never run out. Recharges pretty quickly too and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pickert

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting ... I read all the reviews and was disappointed at just setting it up on a pot to stir . It will not cover the whole circumference of the bottom of a size usable pot . Meaning a sauce will burn in an area it can’t stir in . It can’t stir a homemade ricotta cheese which is mostly liquid . I would not recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for an older parent or someone busy that likes to cook
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 80 year old mother and she loves it! She uses it with homemade soups, spaghetti sauce with meatballs, etc. and it helps to ensure she doesn’t forget to stir the sauces as they simmer. All she has to do is remember to charge the unit before each use!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It really works, with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: Works well (after I got a different stirrer shaft from the manufacturer). I used it once for stirring Basmati rice to get the starch out. I hope to use it on chili, sloppy joes and pasta sauce. It keeps going, keeps the bottom clear and seems to have enough power to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great then quickly stopped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago. It worked great! I have used it less than 6 times and it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I bought a pan stirrer
customer_reviews.text: I love gadgets, this thing works. You can fit it to probably pretty much any pan and it goes slowly and evenly round and round. Gives one time to keep working on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Always Interested

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing kitchen helper! I’ve only had it for 2 days and I’m awestruck. I used it yesterday to make risotto and this morning to make hollandaise sauce. Both dishes turned out far better than when I stir them myself. It is well worth the price and I can’t imagine you’d be disappointed. Update 10/4/19: I use this stirrer at least once per week, sometimes more. I LOVE it! I wish I’d know about this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: KKramer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stirrer, you will too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stirrer! It is well engineered, sturdy, easy to setup and use. Much better than the vibrating battery operated one I was using. I love cooking but always hated being tied to a pot slowly stirring away. With this running I can do other things making cooking time much more efficient. It also does a much better job of stirring than me. You will not be disappointed buying one.
customer_reviews.author: William  A   Hada

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can a lot and need something to stir my tomato sauce while it cooks for hours and hours. This works perfectly. The only thing I don't like is that it is made of plastic and I don't like plastic, heat, and food combined. If they made this of metal, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Manley

customer_reviews.title: That it works great
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stirrer. Used it for spaghetti sauce and it worked like a charm. Also saved my hand and arm. Thanks StirMate
customer_reviews.author: Marcia B

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Review.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and Easy Review. This is a great auto stirring unit. you have to position this correctly to work well but once you do it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Seals

customer_reviews.title: Pot size
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I think works best in bigger pots.
customer_reviews.author: C. pallack

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but it does exactly what it is meant to do. I make caramel and have to stir it for 2 hours but this is a dream! Easy to charge and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Z

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and functionally effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a couple of months now just to make sure this product works. Finally, come to the conclusion that this is a good product and will be willy to recommend it to relatives
customer_reviews.author: Innoma

product_meta.title: StirMATE Smart Pot Stirrer - Self-Adjusting, Powerful, Quiet, Cordless
feature_bullets: HANDS FREE stirring. Stirs your soups, stews, risottos, chili, polenta, sauces, candy, caramelized onions, cheese curds and much more to your desired creaminess and consistency.
SELF ADJUSTS to full range of pot sizes 6-12 inches in diameter and 3-9 inches in depth.
QUIET HIGH TORQUE motor stirs for up to 13 hours per charge with only 1/2-hour re-charging.
ATTACHMENTS available - Thermometer kit, and extra-large pot (up to 6 gallon) stirrer. (sold separately)
PATTENTED stirrer designed to gently sweep the pot bottom and prevent food burning and pot scorching.
